snippet: The Republican Party of Rhode Island attracts scorn for a plan to raffle an assault rifle to raise money.
abstract: Editorial joins outcry over Rhode Island Republican Party's decision to raise money by raffling an AR-15-style assault rifle during so-called 2nd Amendment celebration; holds raffle is more proof of gap between the anguish of the citizenry at repeated shooting sprees and the complacency of politicians who do so little to address them.
lead_paragraph: The Republican Party of Rhode Island attracts scorn for a plan to raffle an assault rifle to raise money.
